1097.text:
We don't have that
kind of forethought.

1098.text:
We're just like,
oh, I don't know.

1099.text:
I guess we'll just
film some stuff.

1101.text:
Yeah, we don't really ever think
about that part of the song.

And like for "Such
a Loser," we had

1105.text:
it animated by these people in

thing, and Kate and I,

1110.text: we always have a million notes.

started crying, both of us.

And they were,
well, we have like

1120.text: And we're like no, love it.

So sometimes it's
like that easy.

I was going to say,

1125.text:
so for you, notes are really
a bad thing in general.

1128.text: I always have so many notes.

1140.text:

and we're in the editing

We just get our

think I'm the only
